name: Noam Chomsky
quote: Optimism is a strategy for making a better future. Because unless you believe that the future can be better, it's unlikely you will step up and take responsibility for making it so. If you assume that there's no hope, you guarantee that there will be no hope. If you assume that there's an instinct to freedom, there are opportunities to change things, there's a change you can contribute to making a better world. The choice is yours.
